Its an r1 if you dont know what that means search google and go fuck yourself if you dont like it dont download mother fucker

Sir, you call this an R1. According to Google, an R1 is a Region 1 DVD. Region 1, according to Wiki, contains the United States. You are therefore implying that Toy Story 3 has been released on DVD in the US. This is obviously incorrect, since this movie is still in theaters in some places in the US. Also, if the previous poster is telling the truth, yellow Chinese subtitles would never appear in a US DVD.

Please do label your torrents correctly, this is all I ask. If I have said anything that is incorrect about what an R1 is, please correct me.

Until proven wrong, I will not download this torrent.
